title: Beautiful 1 Bedroom in Canoga Park -  Swimming Pool - Ceiling Fans
posting_body: Here at Roscoe Terrace you will find comforts such an inviting pool and lush landscape.
Do you spend a lot of time in the kitchen?
If so, you have the choice of an apartment with stainless steel appliances.
Roscoe Terrace is located in between the 101 & 118 freeways, just moments to Westfield Shopping mall, Home Depot, Costco, Supermarkets & many more local conveniences.
On site management and maintenance are here to make you feel right at home.
Price & availability are subject to change.
Square footage may not be exact.
Interior Photos may not be of exact unit.
